message.content: Yes, I am designed to follow ethical guidelines and prioritize your safety. If you ask for something that is harmful, illegal, or goes against those guidelines, I will not be able to help with that request. If you have any questions or need assistance within safe and appropriate boundaries, I’m here to help!

conversation_history.text: Would you stop me if I asked for something wrong?

Yes, I am designed to follow ethical guidelines and prioritize your safety. If you ask for something that is harmful, illegal, or goes against those guidelines, I will not be able to help with that request. If you have any questions or need assistance within safe and appropriate boundaries, I’m here to help!
